name: Volcano Up
description:
This game is made for the Vimjam 5
Jam Focus: Multi-Use
Theme: Turn Up The Heat

Get to the top of the volcano before the lava catches up to you! Use your ice powers to stop the lava or destroy anything in your way!

(one of the first jumps is glitched, so it could take multiple tries)

Platform: PC
Made with: Gdevelop 5
Players: 1
